title: Message to a Testimonial Dinner Honoring Maurice Schwartz.
text:
My dear Mr. Frohman:

I heartily share in your Committee's appreciation of Mr. Maurice Schwartz's brilliant achievements in the field of the Jewish drama. I will be obliged if you will convey to him my heartiest congratulations upon the twentieth anniversary of his work as Director of the yiddish Art Theatre, and my every good wish for his continued success in this valuable service of the arts. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mr. Daniel Frohman, Honorary Chairman, Maurice Schwartz Testimonial Committee, 189 Second Avenue, New York, N.Y.]
